ARABIC: فَأَشَارَتْ إِلَيْهِ قَالُوا۟ كَيْفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ صَبِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: She pointed towards him. They said, 'How can a baby in the cradle speak?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But she pointed towards him. "How can we talk to one," they said, "who is only an infant in the cradle?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon Mary pointed to the child. They exclaimed: "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle, a mere child?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: She pointed to the baby (and referred them to him for their answer). They said, "How can we talk to a baby in the cradle?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Thereupon she pointed towards the child; they said, “How can we speak to an infant who is in the cradle?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then she pointed to him. They said: "How can we talk to one who is a child in the cradle"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But she pointed to him. They said: How should we speak to one who was a child in the cradle?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Mary pointed to the child then; but they said, 'How shall we speak to one who is still in the cradle, a little child?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then she pointed to him. They said: How can we talk to one who is in the cradle, a young boy?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: She pointed to the child. They said, "How shall we talk to someone who is a child in the cradle?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then she Pointed to him. They said: how shall we speak to one who is in the cradle, a child?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereat she pointed to him. They said, ‘How can we speak to one who is yet a baby in the cradle?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But she pointed to the babe. They said: "How can we talk to one who is a child in the cradle?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then she pointed to him. They said: "How can we talk to one who is a child in the cradle?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So she pointed to him (Prophet Jesus). But they replied: 'How can we speak with a baby in the cradle'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So she pointed to him. They said, “How can we speak to an infant in the crib?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So she pointed to him. They said, "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle a child?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:29] Thereat she pointed, them, to him, intimating [to them that they], ‘talk to him’. They said, ‘How can we talk to one who is, who happens to be, in the cradle, [still] a little child?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then she pointed to him) she pointed to Jesus (pbuh) that they should speak to him. (They said: How can we tale to one who is in the cradle, a young boy) forty days old?
